text: Erica Yohn (October 1, 1928 - January 27, 2019) was an American actress. Yohn had many small parts in movies, such as Pee-wee's Big Adventure, and television shows, such as Rhoda, ER, Murphy Brown, Quantum Leap and Kojak. She had recurring roles on The Famous Teddy Z, State of Grace, Beverly Hills, 90210, and Picket Fences. She voiced Fievel and Tanya Mousekewitz's mother in An American Tail and its sequels. Yohn died on January 27, 2019 in North Hollywood, California at the age of 90.Notice of death of Erica Yohn, facebook.com; accessed January 29, 2019. ==Personal life== Yohn was married to actor Tom Rosqui, who died in 1991, aged 62, from cancer. ==Partial filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1974 The Godfather Part II Governess 1975 The Dream Makers Helen 1981 S.O.B.
